# Overview

## Install and load packages
```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, spdep, tmap, tidyverse)
```


## Import Geospatial Data
```{r}
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial", 
                 layer = "Hunan")
```


## Import Aspatial Data
```{r}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
```
